name: Weed Clicker
description:
Hello , 

Here you have a little project, I've create it in 1 week. The game is not very funny but this is my first project. For this game I have already 2 things to finish : create an achievement system and export the game on android.

If you want to support me you can just test the game and say what do you think about it. 

Good game ;)
